Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 19 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 17 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Cold Breath, The Dragon exhales ice in a come.  Each creature caught in the cone takes an Average 58 Cold damage
Other Actions.Action 4: Paralyzing Breath, The Dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed
Other Actions.Action 5: Change Shape, The Dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 15 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: A cloud of fog appears, obscuring the area.  Seems very similar to the fog cloud spell
Lair Actions.Action 2: A blisteringly cold wind blows through the lair.  Each creature near the Dragon makes a Constitution saving throw, taking an Average 5 Cold damage on a fail.  The wind disperses gases and vapors, and extinguisehes unprotected flames
